name: Santa's New Helper: A Holiday Twine Game
name_original: Santa's New Helper: A Holiday Twine Game
description:
Christmas is going to be cancelled, who will save Christmas? Will you help us save Christmas? Adventure out to the North Pole in this Text Based Adventure. Choose wisely or face consequences.

Features:

1. 3 Transformations

2. A main character with no name or gender

3. One love interest

4. Multiple Endings

5. A few Puzzles

This all age game is the first from Cuddletail.
